segments.text: No , it isn't mine . I blundered upon it under the sofa . Do you know whose watch it is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have a look . It's mine . I have been looking for it , but just cannot find it . It's present from my father .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , here you are . Remember to put it in a proper place .
segments.speaker: S2
